Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Ohio/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago & Mies Van Der Rohe Way: due to, street blockage near Ohio/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago and Mies Van Der Rohe Way: due to, street blockage near Ohio/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Western due to an animal on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Western due to an animal on the tracks.

Shuttle buses have been requested Kedzie and 35th to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
